title: Purchasing 400 AutoPi Devices
body:
We've already purchased these devices, but we still want to retroactively conduct a vote to model very basic DAO governance.

This proposal is to spend $60,900 EUR upfront and $12,600 EUR on delivery for the purchase of 400 AutoPi devices. These are being purchased by the DIMO corporate entity (not the DAO) and the revenue from selling the devices and the ongoing costs (e.g., SIM and cloud costs) will be the responsibility of the corporate entity. In other words, this will not affect the DAO treasury positively or negatively.
author: 0xa3bcc9701E360ddF642d6cf23eCB86ba9a95B3cf
